When this creature enters, you may ionize it. [i](If it isn’t an artifact, this creature becomes a 0/0 artifact creature and gains “This creature gets +1/+1 for each artifact you control.”)[/i]
Whenever an empowered creature you control attacks, tap target creature an opponent controls. [i](A creature is empowered if its power is greater than its base power.)[/i]
